collection.name: col_event_persons
collection.prototype:
SELECT ALL_DATA.PID as PID, (select distinct id_type from cont_contact_person) as pid_type, ALL_DATA.title AS title, ALL_DATA.occasionName AS occasionName, ALL_DATA.position AS position, ALL_DATA.qualifierName AS qualifierName, COALESCE(ALL_DATA.orgRank,100) AS orgRank, ALL_DATA.qualifierOrder AS qualifierOrder
FROM
( -- ------------------------------- Связка СОБЫТИЕ - КОНТАКТНОЕ ЛИЦО ----------------------------------- SELECT PersonId as PID, PersonOccasionsData.title, Occasion.name AS occasionName, PersonOccasionsData.position AS position, PersonOccasionsData.qualifierName, PersonOccasionsData.orgRank, PersonOccasionsData.qualifierOrder, PersonOccasion.occasion as occasion
FROM
( -- Выбираем все контактные лица и их организации SELECT Person.id as PersonId, Person.title AS title, COALESCE(Organization.name,'')||' '||COALESCE(PersonOrganization.position,'') AS position, cont_rank.index_number AS orgRank, qualifier.corder AS qualifierOrder, qualifier.name AS qualifierName
FROM cont_contact_person Person JOIN cont_cperson_org PersonOrganization ON PersonOrganization.contact_person=Person.id JOIN cont_organization Organization ON Organization.id=PersonOrganization.organization LEFT JOIN cont_rank ON Organization.rank=cont_rank.id
JOIN cont_qualifier_org OrganizationQualifier ON OrganizationQualifier.organization=Organization.id JOIN qualifier ON qualifier.id=OrganizationQualifier.classifier JOIN qual_group_qualifier QualifierGroup ON qualifier.group_qualifier=QualifierGroup.id AND QualifierGroup.uid='101'
UNION
-- Объединяем с контактными лицами не состоящими в организациях SELECT DISTINCT
Person.id As PersonId, Person.title AS title, 'нет информации' AS position, 100 AS orgRank, 100 AS qualifierOrder, 'Другое' AS qualifierName
FROM cont_contact_person Person JOIN cont_cperson_org PersonOrganization ON Person.id NOT IN (SELECT contact_person FROM cont_cperson_org)
) PersonOccasionsData -- Выбираем события связаные напрямую с контактными лицами JOIN occa_occasion_cperson PersonOccasion ON PersonOccasion.contact_person=PersonOccasionsData.PersonId JOIN occa_occasion Occasion ON Occasion.id=PersonOccasion.occasion
UNION
-- ----------------------------------- Связка СОБЫТИЕ - ОРГАНИЗАЦИЯ -------------------------------------
SELECT PersonId as PID, OrganizationOccasionsData.title, Occasion.name AS occasionName, OrganizationOccasionsData.position AS position, OrganizationOccasionsData.qualifierName, OrganizationOccasionsData.orgRank, OrganizationOccasionsData.qualifierOrder, OrganizationOccasion.occasion as occasion
FROM
( -- Выбираем все контактные лица и их организации (только высшее руководство) SELECT Person.id as PersonId, Organization.id AS OrganizationId, Person.title AS title, COALESCE(Organization.name,'')||' '||COALESCE(PersonOrganization.position,'') AS position, cont_rank.index_number AS orgRank, qualifier.corder AS qualifierOrder, qualifier.name AS qualifierName
FROM cont_contact_person Person JOIN cont_cperson_org PersonOrganization ON PersonOrganization.contact_person=Person.id JOIN cont_organization Organization ON Organization.id=PersonOrganization.organization JOIN Cont_Type_Accessory Accessory ON PersonOrganization.type_accessory=Accessory.id AND Accessory.uid='199' LEFT JOIN cont_rank ON Organization.rank=cont_rank.id JOIN cont_qualifier_org OrganizationQualifier ON OrganizationQualifier.organization=Organization.id JOIN qualifier ON qualifier.id=OrganizationQualifier.classifier JOIN qual_group_qualifier QualifierGroup ON qualifier.group_qualifier=QualifierGroup.id AND QualifierGroup.uid='101'
) OrganizationOccasionsData -- Выбираем события связаные напрямую с контактными лицами JOIN occa_occasion_org OrganizationOccasion ON OrganizationOccasion.cont_organization=OrganizationOccasionsData.OrganizationId JOIN occa_occasion Occasion ON Occasion.id=OrganizationOccasion.occasion
UNION
-- ----------------------------------- Связка СОБЫТИЕ - КЛАССИФИКАТОР - КОНТАКТНЫЕ ЛИЦА -------------------------------------
SELECT QualifierPersonOccasionsData.PersonId as PID, QualifierPersonOccasionsData.title, Occasion.name AS occasionName, QualifierPersonOccasionsData.position AS position, QualifierPersonOccasionsData.qualifierName, QualifierPersonOccasionsData.orgRank, QualifierPersonOccasionsData.qualifierOrder, Occasion.id as occasion
FROM
( -- Выбираем все контактные лица и их организации (только высшее руководство) SELECT
Person.id AS PersonId, Person.title AS title, COALESCE(Organization.name,'')||' '||COALESCE(PersonOrganization.position,'') AS position, cont_rank.index_number AS orgRank, qualifier.corder AS qualifierOrder, qualifier.name AS qualifierName
FROM cont_contact_person Person JOIN cont_cperson_org PersonOrganization ON PersonOrganization.contact_person=Person.id JOIN cont_organization Organization ON Organization.id=PersonOrganization.organization LEFT JOIN cont_rank ON Organization.rank=cont_rank.id JOIN cont_qualifier_org OrganizationQualifier ON OrganizationQualifier.organization=Organization.id JOIN qualifier ON qualifier.id=OrganizationQualifier.classifier JOIN qual_group_qualifier QualifierGroup ON qualifier.group_qualifier=QualifierGroup.id AND QualifierGroup.uid='101'
UNION
-- Объединяем с контактными лицами не состоящими в организациях SELECT DISTINCT
Person.id AS PersonId, Person.title AS title, 'нет информации' AS position, 100 AS orgRank, 100 AS qualifierOrder, 'Другое' AS qualifierName
FROM cont_contact_person Person JOIN cont_cperson_org PersonOrganization ON Person.id NOT IN (SELECT contact_person FROM cont_cperson_org)
) QualifierPersonOccasionsData
-- Выбираем события связаные напрямую с контактными лицами JOIN cont_qualifier_cperson PersonQualifier ON PersonQualifier.contact_person=QualifierPersonOccasionsData.PersonId JOIN Qualifier ON Qualifier.id=PersonQualifier.classifier JOIN occa_occasion_qualifier OccasionQualifier ON OccasionQualifier.qualifier=Qualifier.id JOIN occa_occasion Occasion ON Occasion.id=OccasionQualifier.occasion
-- ----------------------------------- Связка СОБЫТИЕ - КЛАССИФИКАТОР - ОРГАНИЗАЦИИ КЛ не состоящие в организациях не выбираем ------------------------------------- UNION
SELECT QualifierOrganizationOccasionsData.PersonId as PID, QualifierOrganizationOccasionsData.title, Occasion.name AS occasionName, QualifierOrganizationOccasionsData.position AS position, QualifierOrganizationOccasionsData.qualifierName, QualifierOrganizationOccasionsData.orgRank, QualifierOrganizationOccasionsData.qualifierOrder, Occasion.id as occasion
FROM
( -- Выбираем все контактные лица и их организации (только высшее руководство) SELECT Person.id as PersonId, Organization.id AS OrganizationId, Person.title AS title, COALESCE(Organization.name,'')||' '||COALESCE(PersonOrganization.position,'') AS position, cont_rank.index_number AS orgRank, qualifier.corder AS qualifierOrder, qualifier.name AS qualifierName
FROM cont_contact_person Person JOIN cont_cperson_org PersonOrganization ON PersonOrganization.contact_person=Person.id JOIN cont_organization Organization ON Organization.id=PersonOrganization.organization LEFT JOIN cont_rank ON Organization.rank=cont_rank.id JOIN Cont_Type_Accessory Accessory ON PersonOrganization.type_accessory=Accessory.id AND Accessory.uid='199' JOIN cont_qualifier_org OrganizationQualifier ON OrganizationQualifier.organization=Organization.id JOIN qualifier ON qualifier.id=OrganizationQualifier.classifier JOIN qual_group_qualifier QualifierGroup ON qualifier.group_qualifier=QualifierGroup.id AND QualifierGroup.uid='101'
) QualifierOrganizationOccasionsData
-- Выбираем события связаные напрямую с контактными лицами JOIN cont_qualifier_org OrganizationQualifier ON OrganizationQualifier.organization=QualifierOrganizationOccasionsData.OrganizationId JOIN Qualifier ON Qualifier.id=OrganizationQualifier.classifier JOIN occa_occasion_qualifier OccasionQualifier ON OccasionQualifier.qualifier=Qualifier.id JOIN occa_occasion Occasion ON Occasion.id=OccasionQualifier.occasion
) ALL_DATA
WHERE 1=1 ::where-clause
GROUP BY title,occasionName,position,qualifierName,qualifierOrder,orgRank,occasion,PID ORDER BY qualifierOrder,orgRank,title
